Package gameofuofc

Class Decisions

  • java.lang.Object
    • gameofuofc.Decisions
  • public class Decisions
extends java.lang.Object
    The decisions are required stop points in the game. A player needs to make a decision everytime they pass by or land on a decision spot. The consequences of the decision are not revealed until a player makes a decision

      • Decisions

        public Decisions​(java.lang.String newDesc,
                 java.lang.String newOp1,
                 int effg1,
                 int effs1,
                 java.lang.String newOp2,
                 int effg2,
                 int effs2)
        The constructor for the Decision class.
        Parameters:
        newDesc - The Description of the Decision
        newOp1 - The description for the first option
        effg1 - The effect on the grade metric of the first option
        effs1 - The effect on the social metric of the first option
        newOp2 - The description for the second option
        effg2 - The effect on the grade metric of the second option
        effs2 - The effect on the social metric of the second option
